quest.name: Supplying Estimates
journal:
 Quest Sync
Grawley needs estimates and he needs them now.
objectives: Request supply estimates from the villagers.

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: Listen, friend, I'm run off my feet here. I need someone to take stock of our remaining food stores, and you just volunteered.

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: Nigh everything this village needs to survive is hauled up from the lowlands, and if matters don't settle down soon... Well, I won't be surprised when Wright and Stilltide begin hoarding goods instead of selling 'em. Not unless it's for an outrageous price.

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: Anyway, that's enough speculation. I need estimates─accurate estimates, mind you─from them what's in charge of our edibles. Grains, grog, and meats. Off you hop.

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: Grains, grog, and meats. Speak to the villagers and find out what we've got left...

dialogue.name: GRAIN03543
dialogue.text: Grawley wants an estimate? Well you can tell him, “Not bloody much.” We'll need to think of something 'cause we're runnin' low on both grain and beans...

dialogue.name: GRAIN03543
dialogue.text: Grawley wants an estimate? Well you can tell him, “Not bloody much.” We'll need to think of something 'cause we're runnin' low on both grain and beans...

dialogue.name: ZUMIESHAI
dialogue.text: <sigh> We've put a good dent in the liquor we got from the dwarves, so we might have to make do with water at some point. At least we've a fresh source with the river nearby.

dialogue.name: ZUMIESHAI
dialogue.text: <sigh> We've put a good dent in the liquor we got from the dwarves, so we might have to make do with water at some point. At least we've a fresh source with the river nearby.

dialogue.name: WALMET
dialogue.text: Hmmm. I'd say we have more than enough dried meat to go around. There was peril in the hunt, but the haul was plentiful.

dialogue.name: WALMET
dialogue.text: Hmmm. I'd say we have more than enough dried meat to go around. There was peril in the hunt, but the haul was plentiful.

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: ...Grain is a problem, then. I'll see if we can't trade our surplus meat in Wright for a few sacks of barley and the like.

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: That will get us through for the moment, but we'll need to come up with a long-term plan...

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: ...Well, I'll think of something. Thanks for doing the legwork, friend! Say, have you ever considered taking up work as a quartermaster...?
